mcq.statement: Choose the sentence that is grammatically correct from the options provided:Within the convoluted corridors of bureaucracy, myriad regulations often impede progress.

options.a: Within the convoluted corridors of bureaucracy, myriad regulations often impede progress.
options.b: Within the convoluted corridor of bureaueracies, myriad regulation often impedes progress.
options.c: Within the convoluted corridors of bureaucracies, myriads regulation often impedes progress.
options.d: Within the convoluted corridor of bureauerney, myrinds regulations often impedes progress.
